comment.author: 91829349@N00
comment._content: Mitchel was NYC mayor at the time.

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: The event is announced in NYT of June 23, 1915 select.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=F00617FD3B5C1373... Bakhuysen, in his position as Consul-General of the Netherlands present a flag to the city of New York, The event celebrated the 250th anniversary of the city's transition from New Amsterdam to New York.
